dx-empty - Tools
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Index




Class Tools

public without sharing class Tools

Description: Additional utils for classes and triggers

Changes

  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  • 10/05/2012 Initial version.
  • 07/08/2014 IsPendingApproval: Checks if a record is currently being processed by an approval flow.
  • 01/02/2015 xRef utils: Gets map of xref values.
  • 01/02/2015 ObjectRelator Class: Add support for case not sensitive lookups when comparing External Ids.
  • 01/08/2015 ObjectRelator Class: Add support for searching delimited values when comparing External Ids.
  • 01/16/2015 TriggerUtils Class: Checks if a field was not updated.
  • 02/02/2015 GetRecordTypeIdsByDeveloperName: Returns a map of active, user-available RecordType IDs for a given
  • SObjectType, keyed by each RecordType's unique, unchanging DeveloperName.
  • 02/05/2015 TriggerUtils oldMap made public so it can be accessed outside the class.
  • 04/08/2015 XReference Class: Look up references in XReference__c object by RecordType.
    DeveloperName.
  • 04/08/2015 Custom debug method.
  • 04/08/2015 GetRecordTypeIdsByDeveloperName: Retrieves all record type ids by default (even if not
  • available to the running user).
  • 09/21/2015 ObjectRelator Class: Add support to query additional fields.
  • 09/22/2015 xRef utils: Add support to query only one record type.
  • 01/07/2016 xRef utils: Add support for looking up case sensitive references.
  • 01/07/2016 CustomPermissionReader: Facilitates to read custom permissions granted to the current user/profile.
  • 03/07/2016 IsSalesforce1: Returns true if running on Salesforce1 app otherwise false.
  • 05/03/2016 Stack Class: Represents a last-in-first-out (LIFO) stack of objects.
  • 05/27/2016 Method to generate random strings.
  • 06/10/2016 GetRecordTypeDeveloperNameById: Returns a map of active, user-available RecordType Developer Names
  • for a given SObjectType, keyed by each RecordType's Id.
  • 06/16/2016 SendEmail methods moved from class EmailUtils.
  • 11/14/2016 Generates messages in XML format.
  • 01/18/2017 Set of keywords for SOSL queries.
  • 04/24/2017 Capitalize methods.
  • 04/24/2017 Get a field in a (string) set from a list of SObjects.
  • 05/01/2017 Generate a random integer number.
  • 05/22/2017 Stack Class: Allows to serialize/deserialize and push another stack.
  • 05/22/2018 getSettings Methods: retrieve values from CodeSettings__mdt custom metadata object.
  • 07/14/2018 getSettings Methods: methods moved to CodeSettings.
    cls.
    Methods in Tools updated to call this class.
  • 07/14/2018 Base send email method created to support additional features (i.
    e.
    wide org email address).
  • 07/27/2018 Name change for some methods and properties to comply with naming conventions.
  • 03/27/2021 QueryBuilder Class: Facilitates generating a query string validating schema optionally.
  • 04/03/2021 generateRandomInteger: Generate a random integer number up to (length - 1).
  • 04/03/2021 getInteger method: Always gets an integer from a string value.
  • 04/03/2021 isNotEmptyMap methods: Check if a map is not null and not empty.
  • 04/03/2021 SObjectDescriptions, SObjectDescription classes: Retrieve object/ field descriptions with most important
  • info. Uses the cache to speed up execution time.
  • 04/03/2021 UrlGenerator: Generates an URL with parameters.
  • 04/03/2021 generateRandomName: Generate a random name using data dictionaries.
  • 04/03/2021 getBoolean method: Always gets a boolean from a string value.
  • 04/03/2021 getBooleanValue method: Gets a BooleanValue from a string.
  • 04/03/2021 getDatetimeISO8601: Gets a Datetime from a date/time ISO 8601 string value.
  • 04/03/2021 getDecimalRounded: Gets a Decimal rounded to the given decimal places.
  • 04/03/2021 getNullValue: Returns the default value if boolean/ integer/ decimal is null.
  • 04/03/2021 getCacheKey: Generates a valid cache key from a string.
  • 04/05/2021 getMap: Gets a map of objects from a json value.
  • 04/05/2021 getMapOfStrings: Gets a map of strings from a json value.
  • 04/11/2021 getTime: Parses time values from time strings (format hh:MM:ss.
    mmm TT).
  • 04/11/2021 Email methods now return a list of SendEmailResult.
  • 04/11/2021 CsvReader and CsvWriter classes to deal with CSV files.
  • 04/11/2021 UrlGenerator.addBaseUri: Allows to add a base Uri to the endpoint.
  • 04/11/2021 Class FileContent to create Salesforce Files.
  • 04/19/2021 New classes CsvGenericLine and CsvHeader to enhance CSV writer.
  • 05/31/2021 generateRandomNumericString: Generate a random string number of the desired length.
  • 05/31/2021 generateRandomString: Method accepts now the characters to choose randomly from.
  • 06/01/2021 QueryResult: Class to support results of selectors.
  • 06/20/2021 QueryBuilder: addAndCondition and addOrCondition methods.
  • 06/20/2021 stringFormat methods to format strings with up to three parameters.
  • 06/28/2021 MapSet: Class to help dealing with maps of sets, defined as Map>
  • 07/11/2021 FieldMap class, getFieldMapping method: Retrieve field mappings from custom metadata object.
  • 07/11/2021 generateRandomDecimal method: Generate a random decimal number.
  • 07/13/2021 CsvGenericLine, CsvLine classes: getAsInteger method adds support to columns of integer numbers.
  • 07/13/2021 getFieldMapping: Support for negative numbers.
  • 07/18/2021 debugSerialized: Custom debug method to show serialized values.
  • 07/19/2021 getRandomDecimal(), getRandomInteger(), getRandomString() methods.
  • 08/03/2021 stringSplit(): Method to split a string by a defined number of characters.
  • 08/09/2021 UrlGenerator.addEndpoint(): Allows to add an endpoint to the url.
  • 08/10/2021 streetAddressLines(): Splits an address in several lines by carriage return.
  • 08/22/2021 getLocalDatetime(): Gets a date/time in the current time zone from a GMT date/time.
  • 08/24/2021 getFieldPicklistValues(): Returns the picklist values of a given field.
  • 08/29/2021 getWeekDay(): Returns the day of the week for the given date.
  • 08/30/2021 getDatetimeISO8601(): Return null if empty datetime, without processing.
  • 07/02/2022 Refactor FileContent class to allow creating a new version of the file.
  • 07/06/2022 MultiplePicklistFieldValues Class: Manages multiple picklist field values.
  • 08/16/2022 MultiplePicklistFieldValues Class: Now accepts custom separators.
  • 02/23/2023 FieldMap class, getFieldMapping method: Add support for Hash__c field.
  • 02/26/2023 generateSlug(): Generates a URL slug from a string.
  • 02/26/2023 Stack.push(): Methods now return same object with this.
  • 02/26/2023 getTimestamp(): Get current timestamp or timestamp from a datetime value using ISO 8601 format.
  • 10/17/2023 generateRandomPassword(): generates a password using dictionaries stored in static resources.
  • 10/20/2023 generateRandomPassword(): disables saving to cache when running in test class due to SeeAllData=true
  • (setting required to query reports and email template objects in main class).
  • 10/21/2023 FileContent.
    FileContent(): method was overloaded to accept blob content.
  • 11/12/2023 getDatetimeZohoSign: gets a Datetime from a Zoho Sign string value with the format "MMM dd yyyy HH:mm z"
  • (i.e. Nov 05 2023 22:02 EST).
  • 11/16/2023 QueryAggregateResult: Class to support aggregate results of selectors.
  • 03/03/2024 getRandomDecimal(): Generate a random decimal number with a given number of decimal places.
  • 03/03/2024 UrlGenerator class: Fix method addEndpoint(), endpoint path is now added to the end of the base URL, before the parameters.
    New method getBaseUri() to get the base URL without including the parameters.
